mapper.select: select bs.NAME SERVICENAME, bs.ID SERVICEID, bsp.PRICE, bsp.PRICEDESC, bsp.id, bc.NAME CUSTOMERNAME, bc.ID CUSTOMERID from bizserviceprice bsp inner join bizcustomer bc on bsp.CUSTOMERID = bc.ID inner join BizService bs on bsp.SERVICEID = bs.ID where bsp.ENABLE = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into bizserviceprice (SERVICEID, CUSTOMERID, PRICE, PRICEDESC, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, OPERATORID) values (#{serviceId}, #{customerId}, #{price}, #{priceDesc},#{currentTime}, #{currentTime}, #{operatorId})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update bizserviceprice set SERVICEID= #{serviceId}, CUSTOMERID= #{customerId}, PRICE= #{price}, PRICEDESC=#{priceDesc}, UPDATETIME= #{currentTime}, OPERATORID= #{operatorId} where id= #{id}
mapper.delete: update bizserviceprice set UPDATETIME= #{currentTime}, ENABLE= 0, OPERATORID= #{operatorId} where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select bs.NAME SERVICENAME, bs.ID SERVICEID, bsp.PRICE, bsp.PRICEDESC, bsp.id, bc.NAME CUSTOMERNAME, bc.ID CUSTOMERID from bizserviceprice bsp inner join bizcustomer bc on bsp.CUSTOMERID = bc.ID inner join BizService bs on bsp.SERVICEID = bs.ID where bsp.id = #{id} and bsp.ENABLE = 1

select bs.NAME SERVICENAME, bs.ID SERVICEID, bsp.PRICE, bsp.PRICEDESC, bsp.id, bc.NAME CUSTOMERNAME, bc.ID CUSTOMERID from bizserviceprice bsp inner join bizcustomer bc on bsp.CUSTOMERID = bc.ID inner join BizService bs on bsp.SERVICEID = bs.ID where (bs.NAME like( CONCAT( '%', #{search}, '%' )) or bsp.PRICEDESC like ( CONCAT( '%', #{search}, '%' ) ) or bc.NAME like ( CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) or bc.CODE like ( CONCAT( '%', #{search}, '%' ) ) ) and bsp.ENABLE = 1
